item.description:
Our Guest Speaker for our Hartford Area Dinner in March will be Doug Peary, Unitarian Minister, former Vice-President of the Humanist Ass'n of CT, and an active advocate for Compassion & Choices, a group that provides educaton, counseling and advocacy concerning end of life choices. Â Doug will be discussing legislation currently under consideration in Connecticut that would let terminally ill, mentally competent patients get a doctor's prescription for medication to end their suffering.

Join us on Tuesday, March 26 at the Wood-n-Tap restaurant at 12 Town Line Road in Rocky Hill. Drinks and socializing begin at 6:30 p.m. followed by dinner and our speaker at 7:00 p.m.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the private room - the host or hostess can show you the way.
item.name: Hartford Area Dinner Meeting - Compassion & Choices
